DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of tacrolimus for lupus nephritis under actual-use.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Tacrolimus for Lupus Nephritis Under Actual Use Situations
DOC.detailed_description: The objectives of the survey are to evaluate the safety and efficacy of tacrolimus for lupus nephritis under actual-use situations, and to identify factors that might affect the safety and efficacy of tacrolimus. In addition, long-term renal outcome will be evaluated.
DOC.criteria: patients receiving tacrolimus for the treatment of lupus nephritis
